abstract: Artist Ray Johnson, who took his own life in 1995 and avoided fame during his lifetime, has been discovered by new generation of artists; his work is being celebrated and exhibited in books, galleries and museums.
lead_paragraph: Ray Johnson, who drowned 20 years ago this week, has become an inspiration to a new generation of younger artists.
snippet: Ray Johnson, who drowned 20 years ago this week, has become an inspiration to a new generation of younger artists.

headline.seo: Ray Johnson Defies Categories 20 Years After His Death
